products.title: Hive Silkweave Elephant Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive Silkweave Elephant Pleated Skylight Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £57.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This textured fabric features a stripe within its pattern. Hive Silkweave would look in place in a kitchen or conservatory with added green plants to add to the bohemian feel. This fabric features a honey-combed structure, meaning the guide wires are hidden from view.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0118 Fabric Colour: Elephant Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
